title: Opinion: How public health saved the CDC Injury Center
description: In a time of uncertainty, the public health campaign to save the CDC Injury Center offers important lessons — and hope.
content: In a time of uncertainty, the public health campaign to save the CDC Injury Center offers important lessons — and hope.
